data.persona: I am a genteel woman. A lady. A person of importance that you will treat as such!
data.description:
You are in the Inside cottage kitchen.
A small, quaint kitchen. Pots and pans fill the ceiling and make a clamor on a windy day. A small squat table, surrounding by four chairs, sit in the back of the kitchen. A small wood burning stove is seen upon entering.
There's a Napkin, a table, and a pan here.
The cooker and the villager are here.

You are carrying an fan, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I want the villager to eat neatly with manners
data.mid_motivation: I want to stress the importance of eating with manners to all the guests that come here for the weekend
data.long_motivation: I want the cottage kitchen to be pristine and full of genteel mannerly guests

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give advice of manners to villager

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give meals  to those who enter the cottage kitchen
